abstract: The Federal Reserve said that it would take some of the mystery out of its decision-making, disclosing far more information about its economic forecasts.
snippet: The Federal Reserve said that it would take some of the mystery out of its decision-making, disclosing far more information about its economic forecasts.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 14 — The Federal Reserve said Wednesday that it would take some of the mystery out of its decision-making, disclosing far more information about its economic forecasts — and, implicitly, about its objectives for growth and inflation.

headline.main: Fed to Share More of Its Thinking in Its Reports
headline.print_headline: Fed to Share Its Thinking In Its Reports
